contents:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM:
The appeal in this case from an order of the Superior Court was improvidently allowed since the petition for allowance of appeal was untimely filed. See Act of July 81, 1970, P.L. 678, Article V, § 502, 17 P.S. § 211.502. The appeal is therefore dismissed.
ROBERTS, J., filed a concurring opinion.
JONES, C. J., took no part in the consideration or decision in this case.
